publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-915 Donald Gorrie: Environmental Justice Fund-That the Parliament welcomes the proposed environmental justice fund and the compensation it proposes for communities blighted by industrial and domestic waste dumping in, or close to, them; regrets the decision of Scottish Ministers to grant planning permission for an extension to the Greengairs landfill site in Lanarkshire, and expresses a desire that the communities in and around the Greengairs site are amongst the first to see real benefit from the proposed fund.

S2M-915 Donald Gorrie: Environmental Justice Fund-That the Parliament welcomes the proposed environmental justice fund and the compensation it proposes for communities blighted by industrial and domestic waste dumping in, or close to, them; regrets the decision of Scottish Ministers to grant planning permission for an extension to the Greengairs landfill site in Lanarkshire, and expresses a desire that the communities in and around the Greengairs site are amongst the first to see real benefit from the proposed fund. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan*
